name: Love waifu #157 - Alleyway Encounter
description: The leather dress creaks as she shifts on her knees, the dim alleyway shadows playing across her exposed skin. Her chest rises with quickened breaths, her red eyes gleaming with mischief. She knows she shouldn’t be here. She knows you shouldn’t either. But the way her fingers dig into her thighs says she’s not leaving anytime soon.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
